results.observation: Board of Directors charter establishes oversight responsibilities for internal controls. Annual review of governance structure documented in board minutes dated January 15, 2026. Audit committee meets quarterly.

Management has established an organizational structure with defined reporting lines. RACI matrix for security functions documented and approved. CISO reports directly to CTO with quarterly board presentations.

Risk assessment process exists but has not been updated since March 2025. Three new cloud services (Aurora Serverless, EventBridge, Step Functions) were deployed without formal risk assessments. Risk register does not reflect current infrastructure.

Logical access controls implemented via AWS IAM with SSO through Okta. MFA enforced for all human users. Service accounts use IAM roles with least-privilege policies. Access reviews conducted quarterly with evidence of revocations.

Network segmentation implemented between production and development environments using VPCs and security groups. However, staging environment shares a VPC with production for legacy integration testing. Migration planned for Q2 2026.

Security monitoring implemented via AWS CloudTrail (all regions), GuardDuty, and Datadog SIEM. Alert routing to PagerDuty with 15-minute SLA for critical findings. Monthly review of detection rules documented.

Vulnerability management program in place. Trivy scans all container images in CI/CD pipeline. Dependabot enabled for dependency updates. Critical vulnerabilities patched within 72 hours per SLA. Monthly vulnerability report reviewed by security team.

Change management process documented but not consistently followed. 4 of 22 production deployments in Q4 2025 bypassed the approval process via emergency change procedure. Emergency changes lacked post-deployment review documentation.

Vendor risk management program established. All critical vendors assessed annually using standardized questionnaire. Vendors holding customer data require SOC 2 or ISO 27001 certification. 12 of 14 critical vendors assessed in 2025.
Physical security controls deferred â€” fully cloud-native infrastructure with no on-premise data centers. AWS SOC 2 report relied upon for physical security of underlying infrastructure.
